name: Compress Data for Exfiltration With PowerShell
description:
An adversary may compress data (e.g., sensitive documents) that is collected prior to exfiltration.
When the test completes you should find the files from the $env:USERPROFILE directory compressed in a file called T1560-data-ps.zip in the $env:USERPROFILE directory

input_arguments.name: input_file
input_arguments.description: Path that should be compressed into our output file

input_arguments.name: output_file
input_arguments.description: Path where resulting compressed data should be placed
